channel.title: Prices on Items
channel.description: I have just changed all the prices of every item on my server. Now I need to make it so that when sum1 click the value of the item it would come up as the proper price. How would I do this?

item.title: Prices on Items
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Look around in your buyItem method for something that can help you.

Read full topic

item.title: Prices on Items
item.dc:creator: @StrifeScape StrifeScape
item.description:
@StrifeScape wrote:

[quote=“ChaosPkers, post:4, topic:275770”][quote author=StrifeScape link=topic=364284.msg2765382#msg2765382 date=1240771285]

There is a tut to make a pricechecker search it.

  1. No theres not.

  2. I need to find out how to replace wat it says. For example if it said “Dragon Claws: (80mil)” I wasnt to change it to “Dragon Claws (8mil)”
    [/quote]Config folder> Items.config> Search for the item> The first 2 are normally buy and sell prices and 3rd is Alchemy.[/quote]

I already did that. I need to know how to change the text it says when u go to the shop.

Read full topic

item.title: Prices on Items

item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“StrifeScape, post:3, topic:275770”][quote author=tnt bomb link=topic=364284.msg2765374#msg2765374 date=1240770951]
There is a tut to make a pricechecker search it.
[/quote]

  1. No theres not.

  2. I need to find out how to replace wat it says. For example if it said “Dragon Claws: (80mil)” I wasnt to change it to “Dragon Claws (8mil)”[/quote]Config folder> Items.config> Search for the item> The first 2 are normally buy and sell prices and 3rd is Alchemy.
